Dingfeng Shi （石鼎丰）
Computer vision, video understanding and detection.

About Me

I am a PhD student at State Key Laboratory of Virtual Reality Technology and Systems, Beihang University, with a research interest in computer vision, video understanding, and detection. Currently I am a member of CVTEAM, and my Google Scholar profile at [Google Scholar]

I am currently working as a research intern now at JD Explore Academy with Qiong Cao, Yujie Zhong and Dacheng Tao.
